Introduction
This topic contains information on entitlement requirements and development for Parents’ DIC, including
definition of Parents’ DIC
notifying the parent(s) of the right to claim Parents’ DIC
establishing the entitlement of a parent to Parents’ DIC
acceptable proof of relationship of a parent to a Veteran
effect of the marital status of a parent on the Parents’ DIC rate
, and
when both parents are living and only one parent has filed a Parents’ DIC claim
.
title: M21-1, Part IX, Subpart i, Chapter 1 - Overview of Requirements and Development for Pension and Parents’ Dependency and Indemnity Compensation (DIC)
citation: Part IX, Subpart i, Chapter 1, Section None
